Title: Mondrian dress
Description:
Wool dress with a motif inspired by the work of Dutch painter Piet Mondrian. The front and back are symmetrically divided into rectangular sections by black lines. One rectangle on the left shoulder is colored yellow.
Photographed by Grey Geezer on 22 April 2017, available at Wikimedia Commons: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Mondrian-2017-04-22-2.jpg
Discipline: Humanities - Art (arts, history of arts, performing arts, music) (6.4)
